Name: 流光易逝的夏末 - Fleeting Summer's End
About the game: Fleeting Summer's End is a small game of ADV. The background is set in the remote countryside of Teoswa area, China, in the middle and late August. Deng Ainyang, who was Born and grew up in the metropolis(Shenzhen), followed her parents back to her ancestral hometown, Teoswa, for regular sacrifice activities. In this countryside, Ainyang accidentally met a lovely girl, Deng Kangsui. The two girls, who grew up in different environments, developed from an accidental encounter to a more intimate relationship. [Appreciation] This is the second work of 'GouLauTong'. Thank you very much for the support of our first work 'Tinheung & Sayuri'. Even though 'Tinheung & Sayuri' has many flaws, we have received much encouragement. Thank you! [Game features] Yuri (Girl's love) Teochew people may feel cordial With a few elements of traditional Chinese culture [Contact us] Weibo:高柳堂 BILIBILI:高柳堂 For relevant information and consultation, please also pay attention to our Weibo/Bilibili account. In addition,maybe the Twitter account will be created in the near future.
